message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.query.exception.MalformedQueryException' import. Should be before 'org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.parser.QueryPrologLexer'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.mobi.sparql.utils.impl.CaseInsensitiveInputStream' import. Should be before 'org.eclipse.rdf4j.query.parser.QueryPrologLexer'.
WhitespaceAround: 'for' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
